channel.title: Deltascape assault shop?
channel.description:
How do i change the items in the assault shop?
(obviously deltascape)
this is the shop i mean -
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/assaultshop.jpg[/img]

item.title: Deltascape assault shop?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“lewis`, post:3, topic:267646”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=353339.msg2708143#msg2708143 date=1237129047]
shops.cfg

The rest is self explantry. To find the Shop ID search the NPC ID in client.java
[/quote]

cheers mate.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2009, 09:06:38 am[/size][hr]mate… where can i get the deltascape item ids? they are different to google`s item codes

know any good sites?[/quote]
The item ID’s are in your item configuration file.

Read full topic
